title: Game suddenly dropped from 144 fps to 60 fps, and the camera movement fps is EXTREMELY LOW
body:
This is my rig:
GeForce GTX 970
Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3770 CPU @ 3.40GHz
16.00 GP RAM (15.96 GB usable)
1920 x 1080, 60Hz
Driver Version 353.30
Microsoft Windows 10 Pro

It should be known, I used to be able to run the game at MAX settings, and still hold 144 fps without problem or any drops. But suddenly, it stays at 60, and the camera movement is horribly shaky compared to the smooth movements before.
I'm quite confused.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Espurr VI,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=8G32KQHm,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-10-06T08:11:22.296+0000)
>
> This is my rig:
> GeForce GTX 970
> Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3770 CPU @ 3.40GHz
> 16.00 GP RAM (15.96 GB usable)
> 1920 x 1080, 60Hz
> Driver Version 353.30
> Microsoft Windows 10 Pro
> 
> It should be known, I used to be able to run the game at MAX settings, and still hold 144 fps without problem or any drops. But suddenly, it stays at 60, and the camera movement is horribly shaky compared to the smooth movements before.
> I&#039;m quite confused.

Hello!
I have the same poblem. Trouble appeared after 6.20.16_09_29_23_02 patch. I got no limit fps but in-game i have 60 fps (like with limit) and my camera working not well. Please help.

If you recently updated Windows, there's a recent issue that's been causing fps problems for some players.  Specifically, the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) was auto-enabled and causing fps and freezing issues.  Try disabling that for a fix!  If you continue to have issues, check out our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide in case of other issues like bad game files.  Hopefully that will help!
I've been playing on Windows 10 since last year.

You're the most useless person on this forum. It is nothing our computers and or internet is causing, this is clearly on your fucking end. I run several other games at 42 ping consistently and 350 fps consistently.

Yeah, I'm having the same problem ever since 6.20, sorry to tell you but they wont be doing a damn thing about it, they won't even acknowledge that it's something they did, every post on the forums about this that does catch an employee eye has had the same recycled response. It would be nice if they could I don't know put out a server update, letting us know they're aware of the problem and trying to fix it, but according to them, a bunch of computer's just magically got slower around the same time that patch 6.20 came out. I'm supposed to be running at 350 fps, I'm getting 60 along with 60 ping opposed to 31. "Oh maybe its your internet" No, stfu cause I still run Counterstrike at 31 ping.
